action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A snowy slope with four skiers and one snowboarder. The snowboarder is at the bottom of the image, and the skiers are above them. The skiers are all wearing black jackets and pants, and the snowboarder is wearing a black jacket and pants. The skiers are all holding ski poles, and the snowboarder is holding a snowboard. The snow is white and there are some tracks in it. There is a small rock formation in the upper left corner of the image.

DESCRIPTION: A snowy mountain slope with a few skiers on it. The sky is blue and there are some clouds. There are mountains in the background.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A snowy slope with four skiers and one snowboarder. The snowboarder is at the bottom of the image, and the skiers are above them. The skiers are all wearing black jackets and pants, and the snowboarder is wearing a black jacket and pants. The skiers are all holding ski poles, and the snowboarder is holding a snowboard. The snow is white and there are some tracks in it. There is a small rock formation in the upper left corner of the image.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any trees in your image?

This is my DESCRIPTION: A snowy mountain slope with a few skiers on it. The sky is blue and there are some clouds. There are mountains in the background.
QUESTION: Are there any trees in your image? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any other people in your image besides the skiers?

ANSWER: No.
QUESTION: Are there any other people in your image besides the skiers? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.
